page.title: 18SURNAMES SURVEY IN OGBOURNE
page.content: On this survey we were trying to find out about whether any surnames had stayed the same since the{1881 census in Rockley, Ogbourne St Andrew and Ogbourne Maizey.To do this we asked questions like "What is your surname?" and "Where were you born?" We found that many families had died out either because the family had many daughters and the name died, or a couple died who did not have any children to pass on the family name. Some interviewers met little luck in finding people to interview as many people were out working, and were told by the vicar that it was a very wealthy village and many people worked in Swindon or London and commuted regularly.The surname "Cannings" cropped up many times in the church but this family seems to have died out now.
